content: So these three men ceased answering Job, because he  righteous in his own eyes.
Then the wrath of Elihu, the son of Barachel the Buzite, of the family of Ram, was aroused against Job; his wrath was aroused because he justified himself rather than God.
Also against his three friends his wrath was aroused, because they had found no answer, and  had condemned Job.
Now because they  years older than he, Elihu had waited to speak to Job.
When Elihu saw that  no answer in the mouth of these three men, his wrath was aroused.
